Detailed Description

LineFile.

Platform safe class for reading lines.

For Test Code ONLY. Chances are you should be using file/TsvFile/TsvFile and not this object. This file is intended for test code in util/ being used by file/TsvFile/TsvFile and other code not using TsvFile.

Definition at line 98 of file LineFile.h.

bool LineFile::getline ( std::string &  line,
bool  trim = false 
)

Platform safe reading of a line, stripping the eol.

LineFile::getline.

File is automatically closed when eof is reached.

Parameters:
line - returned if possible, cleared otherwise.
trim - false by default, true strips trailing spaces.
Returns:
true if line is returned. line will be cleared when false is returned. .

Read the next line if the stream is open. When eof is reached, close the file.

Returns:
- at EOF.
